text: @StephenCurry30 @NIAIDNews #SCASKSFAUCI Healthcare wrkers R being required 2 return 2 work, after they’ve been exposed to patients who test + for Covid19, if they show no symptoms. Should they be allowed to self quarantine for 14 paid days to decrease the risk of spread, even without symptoms?
